Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20277 affecting package libldb for versions less than 2.7.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-20277 affecting package libldb for versions less than 2.7.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libldb is earlier than 2.7.2-1, affected by CVE-2021-20277
